description: Scorching the streets or grinding out new backcountry PRs, it’s hard to argue with the inspiration of the Bolt’s vintage van stripes. Pop the hood and you’ll feel the benefit of ultra-lightweight Merino Wool, and a redesigned, smooth-and-supple upper, paired with arch support below. We could say the cushion underfoot is kind of like shocks, or they will shock – either way is accurate. Being powerfully fast and strikingly stylish is not a myth.
name: Darn Tough Socks Bolt Micro Crew Ultralight Cushion Socks - Mens
